project.description:
This will build a the latest jenkins container and will install:

• docker-ce

• docker-compose

This will also add docker group to Jenkins user as well as install:

• vim

• tree

• htop

• sudo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Dockerhub repo owner. **In GOBii this is gadm01 where as the login is gadmreader.**

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: The password used by dockerhub user 'gadmreader' which is a collaborator on the repos owned by 'gadm01'.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch from the jenkins repo used for the build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_LOGIN_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the username used to log into Dockerhub. (techie624) **This is different from DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME as in GOBii gadm01 is the owner where as gadmreader is the collaborator with access to the repos.**

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "$BRANCH" BUILD_TAG="$BRANCH"_$(date +"%Y%m%d")_build_$BUILD_NUMBER echo "BUILD_TAG is set as: $BUILD_TAG"; echo;
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------# # running jenkins image build
cd $JENKINS_HOME/jenkins_container_build/
docker image build -t $DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME/$DOCKER_HUB_REPO_NAME:$BUILD_TAG .
set +x # Turning down verbosity as the password is echoed to stdout docker login -u $DOCKER_HUB_LOGIN_USERNAME -p $DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD set -x
docker push $DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME/$DOCKER_HUB_REPO_NAME:$BUILD_TAG
